CatDescriptText: Cutline from related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 24, 1956, page A1, reads: "Equal Opportunity Day - Mayor David L. Lawrence signs a proclimation for Equal Opportunity Day while Mrs. Carrie Clanton, Richard Ewarts and Ralph A. Briscoe look on. The day was observed throughout the country on Monday by the National Urban League. - Harris Photo."David L. Lawrence was Mayor of the City of Pittsburgh 1946-1959, Governor of Pennsylvania 1959-1963, and he died in 1966.
TitMainTitle: Carrie Clanton, Richard Ewarts, and Ralph A. Briscoe, observing Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence signing proclamation for Equal Opportunity Day in Office of the Mayor, at City County Building
